Travel Interests Reserve Now Destination Location is required Dates Night Nights (Flexible) Dates of stay is required Find Hotels Rooms and Guests 1 Room, 1 Guest 1 Room, 1 Guest Rooms and Guests 1 Room, 1 Guest Cancel Rooms Adults (Max: 8 total guests/room) Children (Max: 8 total guests/room) (Age-based rates may be available) Done Reset SELECT ONE RATE Cancel Lowest Regular Rate AAA/CAA Senior Discount Government & Military Corp/Promo Code Edit ADD CORP/PROMO CODE Clear Done Use Points/Certificates Find Hotels Please Select Your Preferred Language English 日本語 中文 Memorable Gatherings Meetings & Celebrations A t The Ritz-Carlton, we create meetings, weddings and celebrations that showcase bright ideas and build incredible bonds. We offer breathtaking settings around the world, from beachfront to mountaintop to city center, with venues to accommodate a guest list of any size. Guided by our event specialists, you’ll curate a personalized menu with a local touch and experiences that will leave guests with lasting memories. imagebreaker (fullwidth) or imagebreaker (fullwidth) + caption imagebreaker (leftaligned) + caption or collage breaker + caption other than full width image imagebreaker (leftaligned) + caption Sense of Taste Building on personal preferences and seasonal offerings, catering is an opportunity to tell a story through original culinary and mixology experiences. Each meal — whether it’s a coffee break, a lunch buffet or a plated dinner — is a sensory experience intended to create a lasting memory for your guests. Immersive Experiences Bonds are reinforced when experiences are shared together. Create connections among guests with master classes, interactive breaks and local excursions that take guests outside of the boardroom or ballroom and immerse them in the authenticity of the destination. Attention to Detail Events are our passion and purpose, inspiring us to both anticipate needs and introduce elements of surprise to delight you and your guests. Our goal is to weave together an experience that becomes a part of your guests’ journey — one rooted in the destination and brought to life by unique, personalized details. Beyond the Boardroom Bringing people together can be as simple as gathering around a table or as ambitious as filling ballroom. At The Ritz-Carlton, events weave together exceptional service and immersive, sensory experiences to create meetings and retreats that engage emotions and inspire personal stories. Plan Your Gathering A Day to Remember A wedding is both a singular day and a lifelong memory. At The Ritz-Carlton, every celebration is distinctive and personal, reflecting your journey through each carefully orchestrated detail. Whether your vision is to exchange vows surrounded by snow-capped mountains, where the ocean meets the sand or beneath the sparkle of a majestic chandelier, we offer locations around the world or close to home.
